Teamsters for a Democratic Union, New York - New Jersey Chapter Records
Series II: International Brotherhood of Teamsters Materials, 1968-1994
Series II: International Brotherhood of Teamsters Materials, 1968-1994

Series II consists of IBT materials collected by TDU. This includes material on the International's by-laws and constitution; convention materials; contracts and supplemental agreements; pension materials; various government records required by the LMRDA and material published under the Ron Carey administration on women in the union.
